2. PzNDTDTBO
3. PC71BM

The only valid "Value of material property" entity in the paragraph is:

1. better photovoltaic performance

This entity is mentioned as a comparative assessment of the photovoltaic performance of the materials mentioned in the paragraph. The other entities (PSCs, PzNDTDTBO, PC71BM, PzNDTDTBT) are materials or components, not values of material properties.
